item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 4, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I completed shipping my desktop app (178 points | 56 comments)
2. VoxelSpace: Terrain rendering algorithm in less than 20 lines of code (2020) (188 points | 49 comments)
3. Breaking Up with Long Tasks or: how I learned to group loops and wield the yield (21 points | 5 comments)

7. China is the sole manufacturing superpower (30 points | 19 comments)

9. A marriage of solar energy and farming (74 points | 49 comments)
10. U-Haul Growth Metros and Cities of 2024: Dallas Top Metro for In-Migration (7 points | 2 comments)

13. What we learned copying all the best code assistants (168 points | 47 comments)
14. Elektročas HH3 – the most accurate pendulum clock on the planet (15 points | discuss)

25. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
26. Conscious unbossing – 52% of GenZ professionals don't want to be middle managers (93 points | 95 comments)
27. Perplexity got ads (120 points | 154 comments)
28. Show HN: Execute SQL against Bluesky firehose (77 points | 2 comments)
29. RailsConf 2025 will be the last gathering of its kind (7 points | discuss)
